name: deployments_project
description: simple express server with multiple environmets

scripts.start:dev: npm run build && NODE_ENV=development PORT=3001 node dist/index.js
scripts.start:staging: npm run build && NODE_ENV=staging PORT=3002 node dist/index.js
scripts.start:prod: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production PORT=3003 node dist/index.js
scripts.pm2:start:dev: npm run build && pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js --only worker_dev
scripts.pm2:start:staging: npm run build && pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js --only worker_staging
scripts.pm2:start:prod: npm run build && pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js --only worker_prod
scripts.deploy:staging-from-dev: git checkout staging && git merge origin/dev && git push origin staging
scripts.deploy:prod-from-staging: git checkout production && git merge origin/staging && git push origin production
